gt_summary: Buy a new stem and handle for your tub. Screw the stem onto the faucet pipe. Slide your new handle over the stem and screw it in place.
pred_summary: To replace a faucet, bring your old stems and handles with you to the store to ensure proper fit and compatibility. Purchase stems and handles in the plumbing section of your local home improvement store, and follow the manufacturer's instructions for installation. If your tub has multiple handles, secure each handle with a new stem and tighten the screws to ensure a watertight seal.

gt_summary: Visit your local bank. Have the proper identification. Fill out a Power of Attorney form if you need to. Put in writing the child is too young to cash if cashing for a minor. Redeem the bonds electronically. Claim earned interest on your tax return.
pred_summary: To redeem savings bonds, you can go to your local bank or the Federal Reserve Bank. You will need to provide identification and the bond itself. If you are redeeming the bonds electronically, you can do so through the TreasuryDirect.gov website.

gt_summary: Select a topic. Identify your audience. Develop your characters. Outline your book. Research the market. Revise your outline.
pred_summary: To write a book, start by brainstorming ideas and narrowing them down to one topic. Create an elevator pitch for your topic to determine if it has potential. Identify your audience and create fictional reader profiles to help guide your writing. Outlines are important for planning and staying focused, and researching the market can help you identify what makes your book unique.

gt_summary: Add a bow. Add decorative stitching. Add corset-style lacing. Get creative!
pred_summary:
.
Bows can be added to fabric belts for women (and men) to enhance their look. There are various ways to tie bows, and they can be made from leftover fabric from the belt itself. Additional customization options include stitching, cross stitching, and crisscrossing corset-style lacing.

gt_summary: Start holding the barre in first or fifth position. To prep for practice, go to passé en relevé. Plié and dèveloppé front. Open your leg to the side, or à la seconde. Bring everything in at once. Once you have those three moves down, do a pirouette.
pred_summary: The text describes a barre exercise that begins with a passé position, where the working leg is brought to the knee of the other leg, and the arm is in first position. The exercise then progresses to relevé, where the working leg is lifted onto the toes, and the arm is in second position. The exercise also includes a pirouette, or fouette turn, which is done at the bar and then on the floor.

gt_summary: Give your parents time to consider. Follow through on other responsibilities. Continue to show commitment to horses. Act mature.
pred_summary: The best way to convince your parents to buy you a horse is to show them that you can be patient, responsible, and passionate about horses.  Continue to prepare yourself and gain experience working with horses.  Even if your parents say no, thank them for their consideration and keep trying to convince them that you can handle horse ownership.

gt_summary: Create a solution with warm water and mild dish soap. Submerge your crystal in the solution. Rinse thoroughly. Apply a bit of toothpaste to remove mineral deposits on the crystal. Cover crystal in a mixture of vinegar and salt to remove deposits. Dry your crystal.
pred_summary: Cleaning crystal requires warm water and a mild dishwashing soap. For larger items, use a clean, wet cloth or sponge to wipe down the item and remove any lingering soap. If there are mineral deposits on the crystal, a paste made from vinegar and salt can be used to remove them.

gt_summary: Start slowly. Create new shopping habits. Exercise your body to reduce your glucose level and keep in shape. Record your blood levels in a small notebook.
pred_summary: Forming a new, healthy system requires more than just contacting your primary doctor. Seek out additional assistance from medical professionals who will help you cover the cost of diabetic supplies and medications. Keeping your body active throughout the day will also reduce heart disease, stroke, and cancer while improving your mood and self-confidence.

gt_summary: Think about your own feelings about the abortion. Talk to her about how you feel when the time is right. Reach out to people you trust. Remember that the process will take time for both of you.
pred_summary: It's important to communicate openly and honestly with your girlfriend about your feelings regarding the abortion, even if you don't feel ready to talk about it right away. It's okay to take time to process your emotions on your own, but it's also important to be honest with your girlfriend about when you're ready to talk. If you're not ready to talk yet, let her know and suggest seeking the help of a trusted friend or family member or a therapist or counselor.

gt_summary: Measure out four tablespoons calcium (carbonate) powder. Add two tablespoons baking soda. Include ½ teaspoon of stevia. Sprinkle in one teaspoon sea salt. Mix all of the ingredients together.
pred_summary: Calcium carbonate tablets or powder can be added to tooth powder to help rebuild tooth enamel. Baking soda reduces acid content in the mouth, while stevia adds sweetness and sea salt adds minerals. All ingredients should be well combined before transferring the mixture to a mason jar until ready to use.
